contact.location: San Francisco Bay Area · U.S. Remote

highlights: Owned development of large Ruby on Rails applications supporting healthcare SaaS products, handling millions of patient records and hundreds of millions of outbound SMS and email messages.
Built and maintained HIPAA-compliant SaaS applications enabling patient communication, scheduling, and lead management through user-facing web services in React.
Designed and integrated RESTful APIs connecting Rails backends and PostgreSQL databases with external systems; served as primary technical contact for integration partners.
Operated and scaled production infrastructure on AWS (EC2, RDS, S3, SES, SNS, CloudWatch, Lambda), ensuring reliability, observability, and compliance.
Identified deployment bottlenecks and implemented automation that increased development throughput by ~325% while reducing manual errors.
Independently designed and built a full-stack CRM (Rails + React) for patient and lead management, filling a critical operational gap in the product suite.
Built data ingestion and normalization pipelines for automotive parts and vehicle fitment data from multiple vendors.
Designed relational schemas to support performant fitment queries across make, model, year, and part combinations.
Supported and enhanced 750+ live websites, delivering features, fixes, and content updates under real production constraints.
Shipped features across multiple frameworks (Vue, PHP, React) while managing AWS infrastructure (S3, CloudFront, Route 53, CodePipeline) for rapid deployment.
Designed and developed custom client websites end-to-end; contributed to an internal MERN-stack application, implementing core UI components in React.
